zh: 上櫃公司市值、本益比、殖利率、投資報酬率
各類股該月之月初、月底、最高、最低與月平均等指數資訊
各類股該月之資本額、總市值、月成交值、月成交仟股數、週轉率(%)等資訊
上櫃股票該月交易量、成交值、成交筆數、上櫃公司家數、資本總額、上櫃股票市值、投資人累計開戶數等資訊
各類股該月本益比、殖利率、股價淨值比
上櫃股票該月總成交值、總成交量、總成交筆數、成交價、月底收盤價、本益比、平均股利率、週轉率、淨值比
該月份除權交易股票之除權前參考價、除權後參考價、每千股配發及(或)認購資訊
該月份除息交易股票之除息金額、除息前參考價、除息後參考價資訊
最近三年年底至當月底之市場、類股及個股報酬率
證券櫃檯買賣中心 版權所有©1994-2023  10084台北市中正區羅斯福路二段100號15樓
本站建議最佳瀏覽條件：螢幕解析度 1024x768 以上，瀏覽器為 Chrome、Safari、Edge、FireFox。
en: This report covers the market cap, PE ratio, dividend yield, and return on investment for TPEx listed companies.
This report covers the beginning of the month, the end of the month, the highest, the lowest, and the monthly average of all the industrial sub-indices.
This report covers the percentage for each sector of the total capital, market cap, monthly trading value, monthly trading volume, and turnover ratio (%).

This report covers monthly trading volume, monthly trading value and trade count of TPEx listed stocks, the number, the total capital, and the total market cap of TPEx listed companies and the total number of investor accounts since 1989.
This report covers monthly PE ratio, dividend yield, and price-to-book ratio of TPEx listed stocks by sector.
This report covers monthly trading value, monthly trading volume, trade count, prices, PE ratio, average yield, turnover rate, and price-to-book ratio for TPEx listed stocks.
This report covers information on reference prices before ex-right stocks, reference prices after ex-right stocks, and distribution and/or subscription per thousand shares.
This report covers information on the amount of dividend for ex-dividend stocks, reference prices before ex-dividend and reference prices after ex-dividend.
This report covers total market rate of return (%), rate of return by sector (%), and rate of return by individual stock (%) for the last three years.
Tel: +886-2-23699555, Emerging Stock Trading Hotline: +886-2-2366-6102, Investor Hotline: +886-2-23666100
Recommended using Chrome,Safari or FireFox with 1024x768 screen resolution to browse the website.
